name: Through The Frame
description:
Race through the frames and reach the finish line as quickly as possible to get the highest score and beat the others !

Through The Frame is a minimalist platformer game with speedrun ambitions in which you have to use a grappling hook in order to reach the end of the level as fast as possible

Through The Frame has a highscore system that allows players to compare themselves with others to try to beat the scores and get to the top of the leaderboard.

Known bugs :

- Cursor will be visible at the start of each level. You have to alt tab & come back to the game to remove it. It'll be fixed soon.

- You can't put special characters in the player name at the end of a level. It'll be fixed soon.

- You can't put a space in the player name at the end of a level. It'll be fixed soon.
